name: aftermath

effect.x_y: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.

short_effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

flavor_text.x_y: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
